passive.name: Snow Warning
passive.description: Causes snow to fall on an opposing Pok√©mon, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed. Attacks sling snow, and hitting the same target with snow multiple times will freeze them.

basic attack.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby opposing Pokemon and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

base.name: Powder Snow
base.description: Attacks with a chilly gust of powdery snow, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when it hits.

upgrade.description: Also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Avalanche
upgrades.description: Attacks with a gush of chilly ice toward the designated area. The ice forms a wall that cannot be passed through on land. After a short time, this wall melts and collapses, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect.

upgrade.description: Increases damage dealt and stun time.

upgrades.name: Dazzling Gleam
upgrades.description: Attacks with a powerful cone of blinding light, leaving opposing Pokemon {{unable to act|stun}} when this move hits.

base.name: Icy Wind
base.description: Attacks with a gust of freezing air, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when it hits.

upgrade.description: Reduces the intervals between this move's damage-dealing ticks.

upgrades.name: Blizzard
upgrades.description: Summons a howling blizzard in front of the user, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time and {{shoving|knockback}} nearby Pokemon. When the blizzard hits an obstacle, it splits and spreads out to the left and right.

upgrade.description: Further reduces damage ally Pokemon receives.

upgrades.name: Aurora Veil
upgrades.description: Creates an aurora around the user that reduces damage received by the user and ally Pokemon in the area of effect. Also increases the user's movement speed and makes all of their basic attacks boosted attacks while this move is in effect.

unite.name: Snow Globe
unite.description: Attacks with a chilly snow and ice, dealing damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect when it hits. Deals increased damage to opposing Pokemon that are frozen.
